Carga de datos

```{r}
load("accidentes2020_data.rda")
library(tidyverse)
accidentes <- 
  accidentes2020_data |> 
  as_tibble()
```

------------------------------------------------------------------------

Resumen

```{r}
resumen <-
  accidentes |> 
  count(sexo)
```

------------------------------------------------------------------------

Visualizaci√≥n

```{r}
#| code-fold: true
ggplot(resumen) +
  geom_col(aes(x = sexo, y = n, fill = sexo), alpha = 0.6) +
  ggthemes::scale_fill_colorblind() +
  theme_minimal()
```
